fields.value: LOCALMULTIDEM and MDE  Socio-Demographic Statistics (WP2) Dataset, 1990-2005

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset holds the socio-demographic statistics that accompany the datasets produced within the Localmultidem project and MDE network. The statistics cover the period 1990-2005 and serve as background information about the outlook of the migrant and autochtonous populations studied in each city covered by the other datasets.

publicationCitation.value: 1) Morales, Laura, and Marco G. Giugni, eds. (2011) Social Capital, Political Participation and Migration in Europe. Making Multicultural Democracy Work? Basingstoke: Palgrave. 2) Jacobs, Dirk, Marc Swyngedouw, L Hanquinet, V Vandezande, R Andersson, Ana Paula Beja Horta, Maria Berger, Mario Diani, Amparo Gonz√°lez-Ferrer, Marco Giugni, Miruna Morariu, Katia Pilati, and Paul Statham (2009) The challenge of measuring immigrant origin and immigration related ethnicity in Europe. Journal of International Migration and Integration no.10(1): 67-88.

contributorName.value: 6th Framework Programme of the European Commission

value: Barcelona, Budapest, Geneva, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Stockholm, Zurich

files.description: This deliverable contains the city reports for Workpackage 2. It provides description and discussion of the socio-demographic statistics for the general population, population of all immigrants and the three main immigrant groups in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network (Budapest, Madrid, Milan, Lyon, London, Zurich and Geneva) for 1990, 1995, 2000 and 2005.
files.label: City Reports (WP2) Deliverable 4.pdf

dataFile.description: This deliverable contains the city reports for Workpackage 2. It provides description and discussion of the socio-demographic statistics for the general population, population of all immigrants and the three main immigrant groups in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network (Budapest, Madrid, Milan, Lyon, London, Zurich and Geneva) for 1990, 1995, 2000 and 2005.

files.description: This document outlines the guidelines for data collection of socio-demographic variables in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network.
files.label: Guidelines for data collection (WP2) Deliverable 2.pdf

dataFile.description: This document outlines the guidelines for data collection of socio-demographic variables in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network.

files.description: This deliverable contains the socio-demographic characteristics of immigrants in six European cities for Workpackage 2. It provides comparison of the socio-demographic statistics for the population of all immigrants and the main immigrant groups in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network (Budapest, Madrid, Milan, Lyon, London, Zurich).
files.label: Integrated Report (WP2) Deliverable 6.pdf

dataFile.description: This deliverable contains the socio-demographic characteristics of immigrants in six European cities for Workpackage 2. It provides comparison of the socio-demographic statistics for the population of all immigrants and the main immigrant groups in cities of the Localmultidem project and MDE network (Budapest, Madrid, Milan, Lyon, London, Zurich).

files.description: This aggregated dataset of WP2 of Localmultidem in Excel format contains socio-demographic statistics for the general population, total population of immigrants, and the three main migrant groups in Budapest, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Zurich, Geneva, Stockholm and Barcelona in 1990, 1995, 2000 and 2005.
files.label: LMD_Socio-Demographic Dataset (WP2).xls

dataFile.description: This aggregated dataset of WP2 of Localmultidem in Excel format contains socio-demographic statistics for the general population, total population of immigrants, and the three main migrant groups in Budapest, London, Lyon, Madrid, Milan, Zurich, Geneva, Stockholm and Barcelona in 1990, 1995, 2000 and 2005.

files.description: This document outlines the methodology of the data collection of socio-demographic statistics for the Localmultidem project and MDE network. The document lists all the variables included in the codebook of the Workpackage 2 of the research network and documents the sources and terminology used while collecting the information.
files.label: Study description and codebook (WP2).pdf

dataFile.description: This document outlines the methodology of the data collection of socio-demographic statistics for the Localmultidem project and MDE network. The document lists all the variables included in the codebook of the Workpackage 2 of the research network and documents the sources and terminology used while collecting the information.
